# Data Analysis Skill

This skill provides data analysis capabilities with custom tools.

## Available Tools

This skill includes a `tools.py` file with custom analysis functions:
- `analyze_csv` - Parse and analyze CSV data
- `generate_chart` - Create visualizations

## Usage

Load this skill when you need to perform data analysis tasks.
